name: Fitness
description: Some of my favorite activities are skiing, running, weightlifting, and cycling.
description2: In 2024 I completed my first marathon and Ironman 70.3. This year I plan to do a century ride with my dad and more running & triathlon races.

name: Automotive
description: I have a passion for cars and like to stay up to date with latest trends in automotive engineering and technology.

name: Video Games
description: I also enjoy playing video games to wind down and keep in touch with my friends.
